aboutPage.title: Hey, I'm Purdey.
aboutPage.intro: I am a parisian Front-End Developer! You wanna know more about me? You're in the right place!

paragraphs.paragraph: I've always loved languages and research, I obtained a licence degree in Spanish and then I've followed research studies in Pre-Columbian topics.

I realized I wanted to work in a company, I obtained a licence degree in office management / executive assistance in an one year internship at 1000mercis/Numberly. It was my first contact with tech environment
After being graduated, I spent 3 wonderful years at Dailymotion, meeting people passionate by theirs jobs and sharing their experiences!

biography.periodTitle: Discovery and Revelation: I LOVE DEVELOPMENT!

paragraphs.paragraph: During my time at Dailymotion, I started to be curious about coding and I start learning it and I realized I wanted to be a Developer.
With lots of support, I left Dailymotion and start an internship at Beaut√© Priv√©e, an ecommerce dedicated to private sales of beauty products and services.
I had the chance to discover lots of topics as professional developer! The Beaut√© Priv√©e's context was the code refactoring of the site to be responsive, studies about SEO, UI and UX matters.
At same time, during my school year, I had the chance to work on different projects allowing me to learn a lot about coding, project management and ux/ui.
I am currently working at InWebo as Front-End developer in Research and Development team.

aboutPage.passionTitle: Random info about what I like!

resumePage.title: Resume
resumePage.intro: Welcome on my resume page, you can also download it!

missions.name: Develop features and maintain desktop and mobile applications using different stacks (Electron, Ionic v1 (Angularjs), Ionic v3/v4 (Angular X))
Create an Express.js server embedded in an Electron authentication application establishing connection between the browser and the application
Work on process of customization of the main authentication application (mobile and desktop) in order to produce and deliver to customers their own packages of the main applications

Industrialize the build process of customized applications (mobile and desktop) using a Node.js script.
The script clones the project from the repository, builds the artifacts of all customization directories available, deploys the artifacts on a server and send a report by email with build and deployment status
Develop the new administration console with Ionic v4 (Angular X) and Electron consuming Inwebo's API
Work on responsive refactoring of the website using Foundation CSS framework
Improve the front-end development environment implementing a package manager, a task runner, a bundler and a transpiler
Implement CSS code structure BEMIT (BEM + ITCSS) in order to harmonize the codebase
Create reports about best practices in e-commerce environment (scalability, SEO, performance)
Update jQuery version and libraries related using it as dependency
Executive Assistance: Managing and maintaining executives' schedules, expenses and travel arrangements, updating database of customers

Office Management: Office optimization, managing supplier‚Äôs relationships, managing Office Management‚Äôs budget, organization of requests for proposal, managing insurance policies, welcoming visitors and managing the switchboard, organization of internal events (engineering Meetups, seminars, workshops...)
Executive Assistance: Managing and maintaining executives' schedules, email inboxes, expenses and travel arrangements, updating database of customers
Office Management: Office optimization, managing supplier‚Äôs relationships, welcoming visitors and managing the switchboard, organization of internal events (lunches, workshops...)

linksPage.title: Links
linksPage.intro: The main purpose of this page is listing anything helpful I use to improve my skills. The list contains tools, games, extensions chrome, extension vscode,twitter feed etc

playgroundPage.title: Playground
playgroundPage.intro: Here are all my public projects, they are also available on my Github!

projects.name: Color Game
projects.purpose: When I started learning about colors to train myself having some colors in mind quickly, I had the idea of creating a game. This new version allows to choose between RGB, HEXA and HSL with different level of difficulty : limited time and / or hits allowed.
projects.purposeTech: The tech purpose was to use pure JavaScript and create a scoring system, evaluate user choices and manage different modes and difficulties.

projects.name: HaveYouSin
projects.purpose: The main purpose of Haveyousin is to receive a feed of movies about to be released or currently in movie theaters and having a to Watch list system (archives, favorites...). Moreover this is a kind of projects helping me to see the big picture of a project and product.
projects.purposeTech: I wanted to rebuild from scratch Haveyousin in React and MobX in order to experiment it. Contrary to the first version built with Angularjs, I don't use the list system and account management offered by the API TMDB (The Movie Database) but instead use firebase connection system and database (it currently uses the localStorage, implementation of firebase being in wip). That's the possibility to see how works a progressive web application (PWA).

projects.name: CPU Load Monitor
projects.purpose: The monitor's purpose is to display the current CPU load average with a chart and display a notification to the user in case of high load average reached during x min. The high load limit, the time needed to consider a high load / recovery time and the time window history are configurable in the code (in file src/data reducers/ConfigContext.jsx) and will be soon available in the settings panel. NB: This project is not hosted yet
projects.purposeTech: The tech purpose is to create an Express.js local API service and use D3 with React and discover how Material UI component Lib works. Working on Unix only.

projects.name: Portfolio (Here!)
projects.purpose: My portfolio is my first playground, building this new version allowed me to be more free regarding the way I wanted it to look, and redefine my presentation.
projects.purposeTech: This new version is made with Gatsby, I wanted to continue to use React and see how Gatsby works, how are implemented the plugins, how it uses Graphql, the management of a PWA etc.

projects.name: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.purpose: This is one of my first exercise in JavaScript. I really enjoy working on a former project to improve it, It allows to see the way we improve as Developer! The new version has a Lizard Spock version from TV show The Big Bang Theory! üññ
projects.purposeTech: Create a game system and manage modes applying same logic across the game.

projects.name: kwick chat
projects.purpose: Kwick Chat is a school project to create a chat interface and use the School API.
projects.purposeTech: The main purpose of Kwick Chat was to use an API and the authentication management provided by the API, display and send messages in real time .

projects.name: Legacy - HaveYouSin
projects.purpose: The main purpose of Haveyousin is to receive a feed of movies about to be released or currently in movie theaters, and having a to Watch list system (archives, custom lists..).
projects.purposeTech: The purpose to create a web app during the final exam using a framework JavaScript, I chose Angular 1.x because it was the one we've learnt during few months at school. For this project, I used the API TMDB(The Movie Database) and its list and account management. It allowed me to understand concepts as the usage of bearer token to authenticate, the usage of API, private/public pages.

projects.name: Legacy - Portfolio
projects.purpose: Having a website presenting myself and hosting my playground of side projects.
projects.purposeTech: Create a responsive website, learn how to use a task manager(gulp), postcss and then deploy on an ovh web server. I've learnt how to do some basic server configuration, redirection urls etc.
